name: Circumfriends
description:
A small prototype I made for the Emotions & Feelings Jam !

It's a game about friendship where you... orbit around your friends :) While you do so, you have to maintain your distances (but not too much) so the conversation goes well !

Speaking of which, I didn't have time to finish the conversation before the end of the jam but plan to do so soon ! So don't be surprised when the dialogue end abruptly. However, there is already some branching you can try to go explore ;)

The game is open-source and you can find its progress on  GitHub. Feel free to follow me on Twitter for info about Circumfriends updates and my other games <3
